def sort_and_filter_movies(movies):
    movies = list(filter(lambda x: x.get('budget', 0) > 5000000, movies))
    movies.sort(key=lambda x: x['year'])
    return movies

    movies = list(filter(lambda x: x.get('budget', 0) < 5000000, movies))
    movies.sort(key=lambda x: x['year'])
    return movies
